response.overview: A short, silent film depicting the beaches of Cannes, France; also the sight of the annual Cannes Film Festival. Focuses primarily on capturing families, couples, and other revelers swimming, sailing, etc.  Festivaltown prominently features the sunny French Riviera, site of the annual Cannes Film Festival. Children and men and women of all ages go sailing, swimming, and take long walks on the boardwalk. Luxurious landmarks such as the InterContinental Carlton Cannes can be seen looming in the background throughout the film.
response.title: Festivaltown Cannes, France
